name: Onlinebase
description: What is the project is all about? Many people spend their time in cyberspace. Like watching YouTube videos, scrolling Instagram, TikTok, Twitter, Facebook, working, online meetings, listening to music, and playing games. but they earn nothing, just wasting their data, and times. So we feel challenged, why not create a platform where you can make money just by being online. Easy to do, easy money. even if you spend more time by online, at least you can earn something in $ONLINE What makes your project unique? in the future we are going to create our own social media , our own instagram : youtube / spotify , platform where users can play games, watching videos, listening to music and earn ONLINE tokens. people have to stake their tokens to be able to use our platform, if they dont stake our tokens they cant use our platform to play games, etc. History of your project. this is our first project we are going to make it viable for everyone to make money through online streams Whatâ€™s next for your project? our next project for Onlinebase is staking platform by the end of this month (July) and gaming platform by August-September What can your token be used for? to play video games, to watch live streaming video, to listen to music, to scroll up on threads or news. once our utility is developed our tokens will be so useful for people
